page.title: 19THE FUTURE (CLOWNE)
page.content: THE FUTURE OF CLOWNE IN THE EYES OF BOLSOVER DISTRICT SEES FURTHER LIMITED EXPANSIONS IN TERMS OF HOUSING AND POPULATION. THE LABOUR CONTROLLED PARISH COUNCIL INTENDS DURING THIS YEAR TO PROVIDE A COMMUNITY CENTRE.IT IS INTENDED THAT THIS WILL BE DEVELOPED IN A RENOVATED PART OF WHAT WAS THE OLD JUNIOR SCHOOL.THIS WILL PROVIDE A MEETING PLACE FOR LOCAL ORGANISATIONS.IT IS HOPED ADDITIONALLY TO PROVIDE A BAR SO FUNCTIONS LIKE WEDDING RECEPTIONS CAN BE CATERED FOR. IN THE LONGER TERM THE PARISH AND DISTRICT COUNCIL HOPE TO SEE A NEW ROAD BUILT WHICH WILL ALLOW THE MAIN SHOPPING AREA TO BE POSSIBLY PEDESTRIANISED.THE PROPOSED SCHEME REQUIRING ONLY THE DEMOLITION OF A SMALL NUMBER OF SHOPS,TWO OF WHICH ARE EMPTY.
